questions.stem: Which company’s AGM announced major investments to drive AI adoption across India, including AI infrastructure and talent development?
questions.explanation: At Reliance AGM 2025, Mukesh Ambani unveiled initiatives to boost AI infrastructure, talent development, and integration across sectors. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

questions.stem: Which country pledged over ¥10 trillion (approx. USD 68 billion) in investment and signed an economic pact on semiconductors and AI with India?
questions.explanation: Japan committed over ¥10 trillion and discussions covered semiconductors, AI, and critical minerals. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

questions.stem: Which spacecraft successfully completed a splashdown in the Indian Ocean after a 66-minute suborbital flight, marking the 10th Starship test flight?
questions.explanation: SpaceX's Starship S37 splashed down in the Indian Ocean after a 66-minute flight, showcasing reusable rocket tech. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

questions.stem: Which French aerospace company is collaborating with India to produce advanced jet engines domestically for the AMCA stealth fighter?
questions.explanation: India is working with France’s Safran to domestically produce jet engines for the AMCA stealth fighter. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

questions.stem: Which Earth-observation satellite featuring the largest radar antenna ever deployed unfolded in orbit in August 2025?
questions.explanation: NASA-ISRO’s NISAR satellite deployed a 39-ft gold-coated mesh radar antenna—the largest ever in space. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

questions.stem: Which program, launched by STPI, C-DOT, and TiE Delhi-NCR, supports DeepTech startups in AI, UAVs, cybersecurity, LiFi, and blockchain?
questions.explanation: The Samarth Incubation Program (Cohort II) supports DeepTech startups in these sectors. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

questions.stem: By 2030, India’s bioeconomy is projected to reach which value according to the Minister of State for S&T?
questions.explanation: India’s bioeconomy is expected to reach USD 300 billion by 2030. :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}

questions.stem: Which summit, started at IIT Kanpur, brings together scientists, policy experts, and industry to align research, innovation, and policy?
questions.explanation: TRIPS 2025 (Technology, Research, Innovation, and Policy Summit) was launched at IIT Kanpur. :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}

questions.stem: Which Indian space initiative successfully completed its first Integrated Air Drop Test (IADT-01) for crew module recovery?
questions.explanation: ISRO completed the IADT-01 parachute-based deceleration test for Gaganyaan. :contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}

questions.stem: What is the name of India’s first full-stack quantum computer launched by QpiAI under the National Quantum Mission?
questions.explanation: QpiAI-Indus is India’s first full-stack 25-qubit quantum computer under the National Quantum Mission. :contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}

questions.stem: Under the National Quantum Mission, which two IITs were selected as thematic hubs for quantum computing and communication?
questions.explanation: IISc Bengaluru (computing) and IIT Madras (communications) are two of the four T-Hubs. :contentReference[oaicite:11]{index=11}

questions.stem: Which nation’s proactive quantum technology programme, including a Quantum Skills Taskforce, was highlighted as a model in a Financial Times letter?
questions.explanation: The UK’s national quantum strategy, including the Quantum Skills Taskforce, was praised. :contentReference[oaicite:12]{index=12}

questions.stem: Which phenomenon may accelerate biological aging comparable to long-term smoking, according to a recent study?
questions.explanation: Prolonged exposure to heat waves may speed up aging similarly to smoking or alcohol. :contentReference[oaicite:13]{index=13}

questions.stem: Which breakthrough allows electron spin loss to drive magnetization switching, tripling efficiency in spintronic devices?
questions.explanation: Electron spin loss can now drive magnetization switching, improving spintronic device efficiency ~3×. :contentReference[oaicite:14]{index=14}

questions.stem: Which Indian initiative plans to deploy a constellation of 52 satellites over the next five years for enhanced surveillance?
questions.explanation: India plans to launch 52 satellites in five years to boost space-based surveillance. :contentReference[oaicite:15]{index=15}

questions.stem: Which naval defense initiative, unveiled as 'Sudarshan Chakra,' integrates AI, quantum tech, and multi-domain sensor fusion?
questions.explanation: Mission Sudarshan Chakra integrates AI, quantum computing, and multi-domain sensors for defense. :contentReference[oaicite:16]{index=16}

questions.stem: Which Indian institute began offering BTech programs in AI, VLSI, Mechatronics, and ML for the first time in 2025–26?
questions.explanation: CAS (part of AKTU, Lucknow) launched BTech courses in AI/ML, VLSI, and Mechatronics. :contentReference[oaicite:17]{index=17}

questions.stem: Which collaborative project by IIIT Pune and NIT Raipur, funded for ₹4.2 cr, aims to develop next-gen digital forensic tools using ML and deep learning?
questions.explanation: Professors from IIIT Pune and NIT Raipur received ₹4.2 cr funding to build ML-powered forensic tools. :contentReference[oaicite:18]{index=18}

questions.stem: Which rover-style robotic innovation was highlighted in August 2025 for its potential to assist in emergencies?
questions.explanation: ASU unveiled advanced robotic dogs using AI to assist in emergency response. :contentReference[oaicite:19]{index=19}

questions.stem: Which scientific breakthrough let two spacecraft align to recreate a solar eclipse and capture rare solar corona images?
questions.explanation: Two spacecraft aligned perfectly to recreate a solar eclipse and image the solar corona. :contentReference[oaicite:20]{index=20}
